creator: craig.mcclanahan@sun.com
text:
If the underlying data type of the "maxsize" property is an int, as it is here,
the JSP Specification states (JSP 1.2 PFD2, Section 2.13.2.1, p. 59) that
conversion will happen

  "As indicated in java.lang.Integer.valueOf(String)".

If you try something like this in a stand-alone Java program:

  int n = Integer.valueOf("")

you will find that this throws NumberFormatException.  Therefore, Tomcat is
correctly implementing the JSP Specification, and Resin's behavior is incorrect.
